consentAndTransparencyPlan.overview: Comprehensive consent and transparency framework to ensure ethical and legal compliance for workplace monitoring

tasks.title: Legal Compliance Review
tasks.description: Consult with legal counsel to ensure compliance with local privacy laws, employment regulations, and data protection requirements

tasks.title: Privacy Impact Assessment
tasks.description: Conduct thorough assessment of privacy risks and mitigation strategies

tasks.title: Data Protection Policy
tasks.description: Create comprehensive policy covering data collection, storage, retention, and deletion procedures

tasks.title: Informed Consent Form
tasks.description: Create detailed consent form explaining exactly what is monitored, when, how data is used, and user rights

tasks.title: Consent Verification System
tasks.description: Implement digital signature and consent tracking system

tasks.title: Opt-out Mechanisms
tasks.description: Provide clear procedures for users to withdraw consent or request data deletion

tasks.title: Active Session Indicator
tasks.description: Implement visible indicator when live monitoring session is active

tasks.title: Screenshot Notification System
tasks.description: Notify users when screenshots are captured

tasks.title: User Data Dashboard
tasks.description: Provide users access to view their own monitoring data

tasks.title: Monitoring Schedule Transparency
tasks.description: Clearly communicate when monitoring may occur

tasks.title: Privacy Break Periods
tasks.description: Implement user-controlled privacy breaks for personal activities

tasks.title: Data Access Rights (GDPR Article 15)
tasks.description: Provide users right to access their personal data

tasks.title: Data Correction Rights (GDPR Article 16)
tasks.description: Allow users to correct inaccurate monitoring records

tasks.title: Audit Trail System
tasks.description: Comprehensive logging of all monitoring activities and access

tasks.title: Regular Compliance Reviews
tasks.description: Schedule periodic reviews of monitoring practices

tasks.title: Employee Training Program
tasks.description: Train supervisors on ethical monitoring practices

tasks.title: Privacy Officer Designation
tasks.description: Assign dedicated privacy officer for monitoring program

ethicalPrinciples: Proportionality - monitoring should be proportionate to business needs
Transparency - users should know what, when, and why they're being monitored
Purpose limitation - data should only be used for stated business purposes
Data minimization - collect only necessary data
User dignity - respect employee privacy and autonomy
